meanings.sent1: She leveraged her skills to excel in the competition.
meanings.sent2: He leveraged his connections to land a job at the company.
meanings.sent3: The clever squirrel leveraged its agility to outsmart the other animals.
meanings.sent4: The detective leveraged his keen observation skills to solve the case.
meanings.sent5: The athlete leveraged his speed to win the race.

meanings.definition: Provide (a company or organization) with a large amount of financial leverage.
meanings.sent1: The bank leveraged the company's assets to secure the loan.
meanings.sent2: Investors leveraged the opportunity to expand the business.
meanings.sent3: The magician leveraged his tricks to make the financial report disappear.
meanings.sent4: The entrepreneur leveraged the market trends to grow the business rapidly.
meanings.sent5: The team leveraged the funding to launch their innovative product.
